abstract.text: Placement settings (internal use only)
Teads allows you to integrate a single SDK into your app, and serve premium branded “outstream” video ads from Teads SSP ad server.

By default, the Teads SDK handles the audio session by setting its category to ambient.
This means that all the audio played by other apps will be simply mixed with the ad sound.
